name: I need you vs I need you
content: I know there′s somethin′in your eyes
I know there′s somethin′in your smile
我明白你笑容中的含义
今夜这一切似乎都让我失去理智
Baby Everyday I read between the lines
宝贝，每日我领会你的言外之意
I need you you′re always on my mind
我需要你，你永远在我内心深处
I need you like no one else before
I need you Oh I need you
So many things I failed to do
One thousand miles I′d run for you
如今，哪怕千里之遥我也要飞奔向你
You′re still the only one I ever need
Baby Everyday I read between the lines
宝贝，每日我领会你的言外之意
Every night I′m waiting for your signs
I need you you′re always on my mind
我需要你，你永远在我内心深处
I need you like no one else before
每日我领会你的言外之意
I need you you′re always on my mind
我需要你，你永远在我内心深处
I need you like no one else before
I need you Oh I need you
So many things I failed to do
One thousand miles I′d run for you
如今，哪怕千里之遥我也要飞奔向你
You′re still the only one I ever need

宝贝，每日我领会你的言外之意
Every night I′m waiting for your signs

我需要你，你永远在我内心深处
I need you like no one else before
